title: Flipped Learning Curriculum Integrating Basic and Clinical Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical theory knowledge and clinical practicum experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices for in-service professionals, with project-based assessment implementation

learning_goals: Learners can apply foundational medical knowledge in cardiology to clinical cases to demonstrate integrative thinking.
Learners enhance self-directed learning skills through flipped learning and achieve over 80% participation in discussions utilizing peer teaching methods.
Learners can write case analysis reports applying a basic-clinical integration approach in project-based assessments.

resources: Collaboration Tools (Online Forum, Video Conferencing System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
